name: Pasta Carbonara
instructions: Cook pasta, fry bacon, mix eggs and cheese, combine all ingredients.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Cut chicken and vegetables, stir fry in oil, add soy sauce.

name: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Chop vegetables, sauté in pot, add broth, simmer until vegetables are tender.

name: Breakfast Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs, chop vegetables, cook in oil, add cheese, fold and serve.

name: Bacon and Egg Sandwich
instructions: Cook bacon and eggs, assemble sandwich with bread and cheese.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
instructions: Cook chicken, add chopped vegetables and noodles to broth, simmer until tender.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Chop vegetables, stir fry in oil with garlic, add soy sauce and mix well.

name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: Cook spaghetti, sauté garlic in oil, combine with pasta, and sprinkle with parmesan cheese.

name: Chicken Salad
instructions: Cook and shred chicken, toss with vegetables, drizzle with oil and vinegar.

name: Egg Drop Soup
instructions: Heat broth, stir in soy sauce and cornstarch slurry, add whisked eggs while stirring.
